data.eml:eml: Chirocephalus sanhadjaensis sp. nov., a new chirocephalid species (Branchiopoda: Anostraca) from Numidia (Algeria)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Boumendjel, Lylia, Rabet, Nicolas, Amarouayache, Mounia (2018): Chirocephalus sanhadjaensis sp. nov., a new chirocephalid species (Branchiopoda: Anostraca) from Numidia (Algeria). Zootaxa 4526 (3): 381-391, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4526.3.7
